notes: Rockstar announces Grand Theft Auto V with first teaser information.
GTA V official global release; record-breaking sales in 24 hours.
Launch of GTA Online as an online component to GTA V.
GTA Online Heists trailer; major content update anticipation.
PC release of GTA V with enhanced graphics and features.
Teaser announcement and first trailer for Red Dead Redemption 2.

game: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
notes: Flagship Zelda launch alongside Nintendo Switch with broad critical acclaim.
Global launch of the Nintendo Switch console.
Announcement that RDR2 release is delayed into the following year.
Severe backlash due to lootbox monetization and pay-to-win design.
Launch of RDR2 with massive sales expectations.
Surprise launch of Apex Legends, free-to-play battle royale with strong early adoption.
Launch of Anthem with significant technical issues and disappointing reception.
Global launch of Call of Duty: Mobile expanding the franchise to mobile.
Launch of Breakpoint with weak reception leading to later profit warning.
Ubisoft issues profit warning and delays several titles after underperformance.
Major franchise reboot for Call of Duty with strong sales expectations.
RDR2 becomes available on Steam for PC players, expanding audience.
Release of Warcraft III: Reforged with strong community backlash over quality issues.
Launch of free-to-play battle royale Warzone with rapid user growth.
Release of AC: New Horizons, massive success during early COVID period.
Earnings call emphasizing record revenue from FIFA Ultimate Team microtransactions.
Major Assassin's Creed franchise entry and cross-gen launch title.
Quarterly earnings highlighting GTA Online and recurrent consumer spending.
Announcement of the Switch OLED model with improved screen but no power upgrade.
Launch of D2R with mixed expectations and some technical issues.
Release of BF2042 with performance problems and negative reviews.
Microsoft announces intention to acquire Activision Blizzard in a major industry deal.
Annoucement of development after leak
Next-gen versions of GTA V and GTA Online released for PS5 and Xbox Series.
Introduction of GTA+ subscription service for GTA Online players.
Reveal of Assassin's Creed Mirage as a more classic AC-style entry.
Further delay of Skull and Bones after multiple postponements.
Annual FIFA release with strong sales forecast.
Launch of Pokémon Scarlet/Violet with strong sales but technical criticisms.
Official GTA VI trailer release generating global hype.
Announcement of GTA VI release delay; market reaction around -8%.
Released alongside the delay news; cinematic style, introduced protagonists Jason & Lucia.
Second announcement of GTA VI release delay; makret reaction around -8%
